newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products - mogas, naphtha firmer, fuel dow.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products - mogas, naphtha firmer, fuel dow.

text.p: NWE oil products were mixed on Thursday, with gas oil up and fuel oil easier, traders said.
Gasoline and naphtha both gained ground, taking support from U.S. demand. Gasoline was up $1-2, naphtha up to $4. European interest for both was still limited.
Gas oil rose $4 a tonne on stronger futures. Heating oil demand boosted cargo and barge premiums by $1 a tonne.
High sulphur cracked fuel eased as more avails of straight run appeared. Low sulphur pridces settled at lower levels, with a deal heard done for a Danish cargo at around $116 fob NWE.
